tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_migration_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  migration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_habitats (
  habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  habitat_name VARCHAR(255),
  habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
  habitat_location VARCHAR(255),
  habitat_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE gps_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  latitude DECIMAL(9, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9, 6),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES wildlife_migration_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE migration_routes (
    route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    migration_start TIMESTAMP,
    migration_end TIMESTAMP,
    route_location DATA,
    population_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
    animal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    color VARCHAR(20),
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE habitats (
    habitat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    habitat_location DATA,
    habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    precipitation DECIMAL,
    terrain VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE gps_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    altitude DECIMAL,
    signal_strength INT
);

CREATE TABLE tracked_animals (
    tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    tracking_date DATE,
    location_data DATA,
    tracking_type VARCHAR(50)
);
